Keywords: Politician , S.W.O.R.D. , Soldier , X-Men
Real Name: Abigail Brand
Special Powers
PROTECTING THE EARTH FOR HUMANS AND MUTANTS ALIKE: Leadership. // When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the X-Men keyword gain the S.W.O.R.D. keyword.
PERSONAL TELEPORTATION DEVICE: Phasing/Teleport. When Abigail Brand uses it and moves 4 squares or less, after resolutions she may make an attack.
I HEAD THE SENTIENT WORLDS OBSERVATION AND RESPONSE DEPARTMENT: Friendly characters within range that can use X-Men team ability can use S.H.I.E.L.D. team ability.

September 17, 2022
Mattlikethepaint
Obviously she will fluctuate with the state of the S.W.O.R.D. keyword but right now I don't see what all the fuss is about. The S.W.O.R.D. keyword already has such huge crossover with the X-Men that she tangibly does nothing unless you really want to shoehorn the white Vision or Darcy Lewis onto an X-Men team. Personally I think her greatest use at the moment is giving Khora of the Burning Heart her +1 attack and defence.
